body:
I mean.. there have ALWAYS been hard lines. The key is, like the other commenter says, to keep it audited. 

/Trying/ to push the website to do something is different than just allowing natural evolution by posting / submitting. 

With every new platform there are numerous discussions about "how" and "why" and "when" things should be done. 

It takes people doing their part.

body: My perspective on free speech is that reality is reality. If people do have ideas that are bad we should talk about them/to them. Isolating them and removing their expression is definitely not going to convince them. Ideas exist, we have to deal with them and process them. If people say things that are threat to me, I sure want to know about them.
body_html: My perspective on free speech is that reality is reality. If people do have ideas that are bad we should talk about them/to them. Isolating them and removing their expression is definitely not going to convince them. Ideas exist, we have to deal with them and process them. If people say things that are threat to me, I sure want to know about them.

body:
my opinion (as a german dude) : 

it should not considered "hate speech" if you only link to it. my opinion is that the context matters.. and only linking to it without trying to convincing people that they should think the same / trying to lecture them about it so they start think the same way isn't really hate speech in my opinion. context is really important in such things.
body_html:
my opinion (as a german dude) :

it should not considered "hate speech" if you only link to it. my opinion is that the context matters.. and only linking to it without trying to convincing people that they should think the same / trying to lecture them about it so they start think the same way isn't really hate speech in my opinion. context is really important in such things.

body:
The Jews, is it? Every Sunday across the world they gather in their local synagogues, and a big projector screen descends from the ceiling with the grand master Rabbi telling them this week's global domination plans? And they all disperse into the streets playing tempting tunes on penny flutes, trying to get the local children into writing sitcoms and playing the stock market? Is that the big secret nobody wants us to know?

This is probably why Mein Kampf has to be released as an audio book.
body_html:
The Jews, is it? Every Sunday across the world they gather in their local synagogues, and a big projector screen descends from the ceiling with the grand master Rabbi telling them this week's global domination plans? And they all disperse into the streets playing tempting tunes on penny flutes, trying to get the local children into writing sitcoms and playing the stock market? Is that the big secret nobody wants us to know?

This is probably why Mein Kampf has to be released as an audio book.

parent.body:
Your doing it all wrong...

Post something actually censored. Here is the [Great Replacement](https://www.ilfoglio.it/userUpload/The_Great_Replacementconvertito.pdf) by Brenton Terrant

In many countries, people were jailed for distributing this. I don't intend to get this website blacklisted, but this is why it exists after all.
